entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:32 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: WNW 25 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming west 20 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
